alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Guthrie (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 23 at 5:58PM CDT until April 23 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MADISON...EAST CENTRAL GUTHRIE...SOUTH CENTRAL BOONE AND DALLAS COUNTIES... At 558 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles east of Panora to near Earlham to 9 miles southwest of Winterset, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... West Des Moines, Urbandale, Clive, Waukee, Grimes, Perry, Winterset, Adel, Dallas Center, Earlham, Granger, De Soto, Woodward, Van Meter, Redfield, Minburn, Linden, Bouton, Macksburg and Badger Creek State Park. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
